mapper.insert: insert into TBL_STORE (STORE_ID, CHANNEL_ID, STORE_NAME, SHORT_NAME, CREATE_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, STORE_ADDR, STORE_TEL, STORE_FAX, STATUS, COMPANY_ID, SITE_ID, AREA_ID, COST_CENTER, ZIP_CODE, TXN_TYPE, STORE_TYPE, GUI_TYPE, EMAIL, POS_STORE_NAME, INV_TITLE, TTS_AUTO_EMAIL, HCT_ID, PAYPAGE_EMAIL, JSGO_KEY, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_EMP_ID, UPDATE_EMP_NAME, SHOW_FLAG) values (#{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{storeAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posStoreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttsAutoEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hctId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paypageEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsgoKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateEmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
